page.title: Welcome friend!
page.p: This modpack was made for you with love. Enclosed in this book are some things to keep in mind.

page.title: Traveler's Backpack
page.p: You can make a backpack to hold an extra inventory's worth of stuff. It also can cointain tanks for fluids, a crafting table, and a bedroll!
Sleeping in a bedroll does not move your spawn point.
Useful for blueprints, and for learning about Tinker's Construct tools and materials
